data.name: Order Automatica
data.detailed_description:
Order Automatica


A turn-based auto battler secret society.

  • Draft your grid of allies
  • Arrange them in synergistic formations
  • Equip them with a variety of different items
  • Survive against a gauntlet of other enemy grids
  • A variety of different team builds
  • Perform the rites to ascend and unlock new allies and items
  • Character art and some item art comes from Penusbmic: https://penusbmic.carrd.co/

Development Info

Order Automatics is a game inspired by my love of Super Auto Pets, with the twist that your characters are on a grid. The grid stuff is based on some ideas I've had bumping around in my head ever since I played the game Loot Rascals a few years ago, which has a grid-like position-based buffing system.

data.short_description: A turn-based auto battler secret society. Draft your grid of allies, arrange them in synergistic formations, equip items to gain power, and survive against a gauntlet of enemy grids. Perform the rites and ascend with a variety of different team builds to unlock new allies and powerups!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any recent windows version
  • Processor: Probably any processor from the last 6 years
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably any graphics card will work
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If this doesn't run on your windows machine let me know
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any recent windows version
  • Processor: Probably any processor from the last 6 years
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably any graphics card will work
  • Additional Notes: If this doesn't run on your windows machine let me know
